channel.title: Ubiquiti on Deimosfr Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ubiquiti on Deimosfr Blog

item.title: Restore EdgeRouter USB drive
item.description: I’ve a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter PoE since several years now and really like it. Fanless, small, running on Debian (unfortunately not really up to date) and powerful. However I recently had issues with the disk. Simply dead and obviously a reboot didn’t repaired it. I’ve been searching solutions on the official forum to replace the disk and I was surprised about the fact it runs on a simple USB stick. I decided to replace it with a Kingston one:
